if(c.NpcDialogue == 176){ c.NpcDialogue = 25; (Not sure what this does) c.NpcDialogueSend = false; (Not sure what this does, I also need help). }
[/quote] I’ll try.

Okay goodluck, tell me if it works.[/quote] It works.
But do you know how when I click “No way, that looks scary!” It will close?

item.title: [Delta] Help :L
item.dc:creator: @awa006 awa006
item.description:
@awa006 wrote:

Okay i’ve added

case 175: talk("You've found a hidden tunnel, do you want to enter?", ""); break; case 176: choice("Yeah I'm fearless!", "No way, that looks scary!"); toX = 3568; toY = 9695; break; Okay i made this come by clicking on a object but the only problem
when I come to the “You’ve found a hidden tunnel, do you want to enter?”
and press click here to continue.
it teleports me before the choice comes.
Is there something I’ve coded wrong? Please post below!

Thanks, Alan
